name: .ODIF File Extension
summary: Learn about .ODIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Encoded binary document that uses the ODIF (Open Document Interchange Format) file format, which is part of the Open Document Architecture (ODA) standard; stores the binary data stream representation of an ODA document; used as a transport format suitable for transmission between systems.

content: ODA is an object-oriented document architecture that was developed in the 1980s and 1990s, but it was not well-accepted. It is rarely used.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
